title: Import CSV in MsSqL for mRemoteNG
author: yilmazc
body_snippet:
HI,

I would like to import a csv file into a ms sql database so that mremoteng can reuperate all my connections in this database.
i have before export all my vms servers from vcenter to csv, like this : 
Name | Hostname | Description | Protocol |  vcenter        |   IP  Address      |  Mac address
vm1      vm1             desc vm1      RDP        vcenter01       192.168.0.xxx       adr mac
vm2      vm2             desc vm2      SSH2      vcenter01        192.168.3.xxx       adr mac
vm3  ...

comments.snippet: Or How can i import directly my csv in mremoteNG (confcons.xml)  ?
comments.author: yilmazc

comments.snippet: Triage (P3 stale status): this issue is labeled as actively worked, but activity appears stale. Please confirm whether work is still in progress. If not, please relabel to Need 2 check (or close) to keep status labels accurate.
